text: Heshan Subdistrict () is a subdistrict and the seat of Heshan District in Yiyang Prefecture-level City, Hunan, China. The subdistrict was reformed through the amalgamation of Longguangqiao Township () and the former Heshan Subdistrict on November 26, 2015. It has an area of with a population of 145,500 (as of 2010 census).湖南省民政厅 湘民行发〔2015〕91号 批复同意: 同意龙光桥镇、赫山街道成建制合并设立赫山街道。新设立的赫山街道辖31个建制村，14个社区，总面积126.98平方千米，总人口14.55万人，办事处驻洪家村社区（原赫山街道办事处驻地）. see rednet.cn (November 26, 2015) ==References== Category:Heshan District Category:Township-level divisions of Hunan
title: Heshan Subdistrict, Yiyang
